title: Plat 3 support looking for ADC DUO
body: add me if your plat 3+ i was in challenger team last season

replies.body:
yo, i can't find you in game - can you add me? 

~CyanPhoenix
I don't mind playing as an adc duo, if you wouldn't mind hit me up and we can practice together to get comfortable and manage our time zones out to play a ranked game, cheerio.
